001package net.tvburger.jdl.linear;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Strategy;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.basis.BasisFunction;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.HyperparameterConfigurable;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.LinearCombination;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.TrainableScalarFunction;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.UnaryEstimationFunction;
010
011import java.util.HashMap;
012import java.util.Map;
013
014@Strategy(Strategy.Role.CONCRETE)
015public class LinearBasisFunctionModel<N extends Number> implements LinearModel<N>, TrainableScalarFunction<N>, HyperparameterConfigurable, UnaryEstimationFunction<N> {
016
017    public static final String HP_M = "M";
018
019    private final Map<String, Object> hyperparameters;
020    private final BasisFunction.Generator<N> basisFunctionGenerator;
021    private FeatureExtractor<N> featureExtractor;
022    private LinearCombination<N> linearCombination;
023
024    private static void ensureValidM(int m) {
025        if (m < 0) {
026            throw new IllegalArgumentException("M must be >= 0!");
027        }
028    }
029
030    public static <N extends Number> LinearBasisFunctionModel<N> create(int m, BasisFunction.Generator<N> basisFunctionGenerator) {
031        return new LinearBasisFunctionModel<>(m, basisFunctionGenerator);
032    }
033
034    private static Map<String, Object> createHyperparameters(int m) {
035        ensureValidM(m);
036        Map<String, Object> hyperparameters = new HashMap<>();
037        hyperparameters.put(HP_M, m);
038        return hyperparameters;
039    }
040
041    protected LinearBasisFunctionModel(int m, BasisFunction.Generator<N> basisFunctionGenerator) {
042        this(createHyperparameters(m), basisFunctionGenerator, basisFunctionGenerator.generate(m), LinearCombination.create(m, basisFunctionGenerator.getCurrentNumberType()));
043    }
044
045    public LinearBasisFunctionModel(Map<String, Object> hyperparameters, BasisFunction.Generator<N> basisFunctionGenerator, FeatureExtractor<N> featureExtractor, LinearCombination<N> linearCombination) {
046        this.hyperparameters = hyperparameters;
047        this.basisFunctionGenerator = basisFunctionGenerator;
048        this.featureExtractor = featureExtractor;
049        this.linearCombination = linearCombination;
050    }
051
052    public FeatureExtractor<N> getFeatureExtractor() {
053        return featureExtractor;
054    }
055
056    public int getModelComplexity() {
057        return (Integer) hyperparameters.get(HP_M);
058    }
059
060    public void setModelComplexity(int m) {
061        ensureValidM(m);
062        hyperparameters.put(HP_M, m);
063        featureExtractor = basisFunctionGenerator.generate(m);
064        linearCombination = LinearCombination.create(m, getCurrentNumberType());
065    }
066
067    @Override
068    public Map<String, Object> getHyperparameters() {
069        return hyperparameters;
070    }
071
072    @Override
073    public void setHyperparameter(String name, Object value) {
074        switch (name) {
075            case HP_M:
076                if (value instanceof Integer i) {
077                    setModelComplexity(i);
078                } else {
079                    throw new IllegalArgumentException("Invalid value: " + value);
080                }
081                break;
082            default:
083                throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unsupported hyperparameter: " + name);
084        }
085    }
086
087    @Override
088    public N[] getParameters() {
089        return linearCombination.getParameters();
090    }
091
092    @Override
093    public N estimateUnary(N input) {
094        N[] features = featureExtractor.extractFeatures(input);
095        return linearCombination.estimateScalar(features);
096    }
097
098    @Override
099    public N[] calculateParameterGradients(N[] inputs) {
100        return linearCombination.calculateParameterGradients(inputs);
101    }
102
103    @Override
104    public JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> getCurrentNumberType() {
105        return linearCombination.getCurrentNumberType();
106    }
107}
